abstract.text: The ARTC-SIMTech-SST Innovation Camp was a hackathon in partnership with the Advanced Remanufacturing and Technology Centre (ARTC), themed around recycling
The academic or school-based awards Iâ€™ve received, recognising academic or school achievements
The Swift Student Challenge is a challenge hosted by Apple for students to showcase their creativity and coding capabilities through Swift app playgrounds
Competitve Programming is a sport where participants solve algorithmic problems in a limited amount of time
Hack â€˜nâ€™ Roll is an annual hackathon hosted by the National University of Singapore (NUS) School of Computing, for secondary school to university students
The IMDA National Youth Tech Championship, 2023 was a competition where students use drones to navigate obstacle courses
The Infocomm Media Club Youth Award is awarded by IMDA
Some other competitions that donâ€™t exactly fit into the other categories
The National STEM Championship is a competition organised by the Science Centre Singapore, where students are tasked to solve real-world problems using STEM concepts
Robotics competitions usually involve building a robot to complete several tasks or navigating around a course
The SST Inc. App of the Year is awarded by SST Inc. to recognise apps that make significant contributions to their target communities

abstract.text: The Big D camp is an engineering hackathon, themed around accessibility in 2024
